CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 12, 1946, pg. 21, reads: "Producer Visits - John Wildberg, center, producer of 'Anna Lucasta,' his drama which opens at the Nixon Theatre on Oct. 14, visited The Pittsburgh Courier offices while in town Tuesday, in connection with his play. On the left is Mrs. Wildberg and on the right is George F. Brown, theatrical writer for The Courier. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mildred (Ellen) Squires Leeds Wildberg, theater producer John "Jack" Wildberg, and Courier theatrical writer George F. Brown seated behind table with newspaper, in Pittsburgh Courier office
